content: This is a really good app, I love it.
replyContent: Hi, and we love your review. :) Have fun with Mindz.

content: This app makes planning easy. I recommend it for projects that you are not sure how to start. Being able to get a bunch of ideas out of my head changes the game. And the flow chart like structure of a mind map makes navigating projects simple and easy. The layout and design of this app make using it a joy.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your opinion.We are very happy that you like Mindz so much. :)

content: I love it, thank you so much for this app.
replyContent: Hi, thank you very much for your review. We are glad that you like Mindz. :)

content: I love it when a big map can be broken down into smaller maps and each can be further broaden, and then broken down again. By the time you realized, you are deep into your thoughts, and over time I'm sure you have improved on whatever you're working on. Kudos to the creator.
replyContent: Hi, thank you very much for your kind words. :) Further much fun with Mindz. Thanks a lot!

content: Most intuitive, easiest, customizable, not to mention beautiful mind map app I've ever tried!
replyContent: Hi, thanks a lot for your review. We are very pleased that you like our app so much. :)

content: This app is great. It just works
replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your review. We are very happy that you like Mindz so much. :)

content: Best mind map app here in play store. The only problem is no partner sync, when you lost your phone how can I retrieve my data
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. We are glad that you like Mindz so much. Until the synchronization is finished, we recommend to export and save the maps. You can also save them directly in Drive or Dropbox. And the export can also be done with a few clicks for all maps.

content: Very flexible and unlimiting
replyContent: Hi, we're glad that you like Mindz. :) Thanks for your rating.

content: Love this app, absolute amazing and smooth to use only wish it had more features and options, like the option to change the nodes width as having a long skinny node look really ugly
replyContent: Hi, thanks for the kind words and your rating. :) Thanks also for your suggestions. I wrote them down as a feature request. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: A great tool to sort out classifications flexibly. Thanks!
replyContent: Hi, we're happy that you like Mindz so much. Thanks for your rating and have fun creating beautiful mind maps. :)

content: Best mindmap app for android. (Feature requests: Nodes automatically don't overlap each other and the ability to add new nodes from the mind map view)
replyContent: Hi, nice that you like Mindz so much. Thanks a lot for your review. :) Unfortunately, I do not understand point 1 exactly. Please send me a mail to support@mindz.de so that we can discuss this in more detail if necessary.

content: I love this app! Best way to make a solid plan!
replyContent: Hi, We are very pleased about that. Thank you so much for your opinion. :)

content: Good for organizing information. The larger the project the more useful Mindz is.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for the update of your review. We are very happy that you like Mindz so much. :)

content: Simple. Smooth. Well thought through with tricks to make it easy to use on mobile phones. Empathetic developer. I switch a lot between my phone and Windows Surface and would love to see a seamless experience to work on both. Maybe a long shot for now considering that this sort of functionality doesn't exist between Android devices (phone/tab). Good luck. Great app. Eid Mubarak.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. :) We are trying to release these features, which are also important for us, as soon as possible. Have a nice day.

content: All is really useful but it's missing browser synchronization
replyContent: Hi, thank you so much for your review. :) Synchronization is the next big feature. We are trying to make it available as soon as possible. Unfortunately time is a bit short due to the current situation.

content: Bought the pro version, so far so good.. love all the features :)
replyContent: Hi, and we love your review. Thank you so much for that. :)

content: A really nice and power full app crossing together mind map and cards. Quick and responsive Dev team, lots of languages... Just lacking a few features to replace the 5 apps I actually use, but Tom and the team are working on it ;). Mindz is my first choice to sum up quickly a meeting offering me both a mind map and the card mode if needing more details on a specific point.
replyContent: Hey Bruno, nice to hear from you and thanks for your review. :) Too bad it wasn't enough for the fifth star but I think we will earn it if we find the time to dedicate ourselves to your feature requests. ;) But before that, we still have to get the cloud and desktop up and running. Sorry for the delay. Have a nice day. Kind regards, Tom :)

content: Best Mind mapping app of the store, even better than any of those expensive monthly subscription
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. I already answered your support request. There you can see that the log file has nothing to do with the export of your Mindmaps :). But it is still very easy to export your maps (check my mail). If you have any questions, just write to me. Until then, have a nice day. Greetings Tom :)

content: Almost perfect! The GUI is perfect and the control is very good even on mobile phone screen. It supports image, preset icon, multiple links and attachments for each node. Each Mindmap can be exported in its proprietary format with full content and exported in OPML format with node title and description. It is a highly recommend app.
replyContent: Hi, Thank you very much for your review. We are very happy that you like Mindz so much. :)

content: Great app
replyContent: Hi, Thanks for your review. :)

content: Worth for the money spent
replyContent: Hi, We are really very pleased about that. Thank you very much for your rating and the offer with the translation. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom :)

content: Amazing and great app
replyContent: Hi, Thank you very much for your rating. :)

content: Would not open new nodes on tablet.(Android 9). I reinstalled and things work much better. Will see how it goes.
replyContent: Hi, We are very happy about that and thanks a lot for changing your rating. If you have any problems or questions, just send me a mail to support@mindz.de. Then I will be happy to help you in more detail. Until then, have a nice day.

content: This had been the perfect app for this. I have gone through bunches of mind map apps but for my tablet, this is THE BEST, hands down. I only regret that there's isn't a desktop version that I can use on the bigger screen and the sync to my tablet, using the tablet app when I'm on the run. This is the best.
replyContent: That pleases us very much. :) Thanks for your review. We are already working on the desktop version including sync. We will do as fast as possible.

content: Top class experience well worth pro version.
replyContent: Hi, Thank you very much for your evaluation! :)

content: Love this app... Looked for something like it for a long time. Works really smoothly as well. UI is like butter. It's perfect for what I was looking for and visually sleek. Only wish: white color icon choice, & Dark mode had black background option, not just Grey. Custom background isn't a bad idea either. But really just want it Jett black. But I really love the app. Easy 5 stars and a thumbs up purchase 👍
replyContent: Thanks a lot for your review. We are very pleased that you like Mindz so much. :) I have noted down your wishes as a feature requests.

content: Great app! I love it. Thank you very much for Mindz!
replyContent: Hi, And we love your review. Thanks a lot :)

content: So far so good
replyContent: Hi, Thanks for your rating. :)

content: Such a beautiful interface which makes it so quick and easy to arrange the information much better than I ever could. I'm just a bit sad that there isn't the option to create more complicated relationships so this won't be my primary mind-mapping tool but I was aware of that before I made the purchase. I'm eagerly awaiting the sync feature.
replyContent: Hi, Thanks a lot for your review. We could well imagine more complicated relationships to support for later. But that would require a bit more effort and currently we are working on the desktop version and synchronization. Until then, have fun with Mindz.

content: Clean UI and intuitive to use. Is it possible to use the same node linked to different parent nodes? Wish the colour palette can be expanded too.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review and suggestions. I have noted down your wishes so that we can discuss them internally in due course. Thank you!

content: I'm an organizational junkie & I love mind mapping. I have used several others but I believe Mindz if the most complete. Entering new branches & data is more refined here. Takes a little bit of time to know your way around but well worth it.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for the kind words. It's nice to hear that and it motivates us to keep working. :) Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Very well done so far: dark mode, images in nodes, import export for opml markdown, etc. One of the few best, superb, fantastic, wonderful: 5* easily
replyContent: Hi, One of the few best, superb, fantastic, wonderful reviews ;). Thanks a lot and have a nice day.

content: Great app. Helps me really organize my thoughts.
replyContent: Hi, Thanks a lot for your rating. Maybe you'd like to tell me how we can also earn the fifth star? :) If so, just send me an email at support@mindz.de. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: This app is exactly what I wanted. Easy to input information, easy to adjust information, written and graphic format. Also has the option to create pdf's. With a small initial payment, and no monthly fees, it's also very affordable and well worth the price. One addition I would make is to have an account/login so that it could be used across multiple devices, and information wouldn't be lost if a device is broken or lost.
replyContent: Hi, Thanks for your review. We're already working on a synchronization. Until then, you can save your mind maps using the export function, which we will improve a bit soon. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Best mind map app I found, simple, no gimmicks, straight to the point, gets the job done. the tech guys are also very responsive on queries and feature requests, loved the free version so much, so I bought the pro, very satisfied with the purchase!
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review and support by purchasing the pro version. Greetings Tom :)

content: dude .there is a bug in the program..while adding picture to the node or to the subject..i am unable to zoom or zoom out..its like stuck to one place edit - its working..may be image proble :)
replyContent: Hi, I'm glad you were able to solve it yourself. :) Thanks a lot for the rating and have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Definitely, this is what I need to make clear some complex thoughts. Big thanks to the design and simplicity which do not reduce the capabilities. Moreover the app has the developer support in case you have some issues.
replyContent: Hi, We are very pleased that you are so satisfied with Mindz. Thanks for your rating! Greetings Tom

content: Mindz, a super simple but visually detailed tool. I work on multiple projects, with mindz i am able to map out my thoughts and then insert to communication docs to share the vision. It's a great visual aid that gets the message across and triggers the thought process for the team. Customer service (Tom) were really quick to respond on some questions and gave clear answers. I bought the pro format, really happy and there's more development in the pipline. Highly recomended.
replyContent: Hi, thanks a lot for your review. We are very happy that you are so satisfied with Mindz and we will try hard to improve Mindz even more. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Found Mindz really useful for almost everything. Simple way to condense information that can easily be pulled out instead of wasting so much paper! It is exactly the kind of app I was looking for.
replyContent: Hi, We are very pleased about that :). Thanks a lot for your rating. Have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Hi Team, I am unble to clear description completely once I wrote something. Example: I wrote description as "list of items" then later, I decided to remove "list of items" sentence completely with no description but here, I am not able clear all text. At least I need to keep single later or symbol in order to save. I.e single word: a Single symbol: . Could you please correct that bug if it is or am I missing something here. Please help me. Thanks, I am looking forward your reply.
replyContent: Hi, I would love to help you but unfortunately the translation is not very good. Can you please write to support@mindz.de what exactly the problem is? Preferably in your mother tongue! Then I can certainly help you.

content: I have been searching for a mindmap app with this exact design...forever. I purchased the app outright.
replyContent: Hi, thank you for your rating and support by purchasing the Pro version. We are very pleased that you found what you were looking for with Mindz.  Have fun and have a nice day. Greetings Tom

content: Remorse. Cannot edit it on a larger display using windows. Even using samsung flow, editing text is still very slow. No cloud feature. Switching over to another app
replyContent: Hi, too bad Mindz is only worth one star to you. But we don't say anywhere that there would be a desktop version or cloud support. And if you still buy the app and are unhappy, you can give it back. But to rate it with only one star because of that? :( Even if it doesn't matter anymore, we are already working on a desktop version and cloud support.

content: Great way to never forget. Easy to add up info and easy to find it. Mindz blowing. Actually 2 apps in one, having the chance to us it as a regular notebook, or a mind mapping tool.
replyContent: We are very happy about that! :) Thanks a lot for your review and have fun creating more mind maps with mindz in the future. Have a nice day. Tom

content: Intuitive. Only one issue, easily rectified. I created maps in free version and decide to get the pro version, they appear to be separate apps. I needed to export work from the free version, import into pro, then uninstall free version. Minor.
replyContent: Hi, Thanks for your rating. We will consider importing the Free Maps directly into the Pro or offering this option to the user at the first start of the Pro Version. I think that might be helpful. Thanks for your suggestion and have a nice day. :)

content: Add google support and it will be perfect
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. I suppose you mean a cloud sync with Google support? We are already working on that and plan to release it in combination with the desktop version of Mindz early next year. Have a nice day.

content: Its realy a great mind mapping app. Thats why i now use the Pro Version. But consider you does not work here primary in the map like other mindmaps. You work in lists and thats very usefull for me. That makes the app easy to use on small displays and help me to focus my work.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. It's nice to see that users recognize and like the idea behind Mindz. Keep up the fun! Have a nice day.

content: Amazing app. Different of others mind map, it not let you draw a map diractly , but through nested lists and automatic generated a mind map you can adjust latter . This design make app easy to use in many things. Specially, I just need a place to record something in most time .
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. Nice that you like the idea of Mindz. :)  And thanks again for your bug report. The next update will coming soon and fix this little bug. Have a nice day. Tom

content: Eazy to use and do the job well. 4 stars for occasional crashes.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review. Of course crashes are not in our interest. You are welcome to contact us at support@mindz.de, so that we can see why this is happening with you. Have a nice day.

content: well, the very beginning was somewhat tricky. this being due to the adapting learn process. it lasted long, yet. but now everything is going well, and smooth, the app's pro price is already paying itself off; I am working with this rather well, and I am starting to give to it the topmost level of preference. it's good to grow friend with this application. it will last ! FIVE STARS FULLY DESERVED.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your evaluation and kind words. :) I can well understand that the start was a bit tricky. That's why in a few days there will be a better introduction to the app. So it should be easier for new users to understand the principle. Have a nice day. Thank you, greetings Tom

content: Sehr gut und echt praktisch!! Mit den neuen Export Funktionen perfekt für mich!! Super schneller Support und super App!
replyContent: Hi, vielen Dank für deine Bewertung. Schön, dass dir Mindz nun noch besser gefällt! Was den Support angeht, man tut was man kann. :) Ich wünsch dir einen schönen Tag. Danke, Lieben Gruß Tom

content: I was introduced to mind mapping over 10 years ago just with pen and paper. Although I had seen MM apps before, I wasn't tempted to download due to the clunky looking interface. This app has raised the bar in this field. The UI is attractive, intuitive & flexible, haven't made full use of this yet but so far it's an impressive piece of software I intend to use more. Only suggestion I have is to implement androids double tap, hold & swipe up or down to control the zoom level. Thanks
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your great review. We are very happy that you like Mindz! I took your suggestion as a Feature Request. Have a nice day. Thank you. :)

content: I have used the app during and since the beta stage, and I think the app is very efficient and easy and quick to use, it is very easy to make, change and add to nodes. The map view is well implemented, and allows you to move the nodes around very easily. Overall I think this is the best app for mindmapping I have used.
replyContent: Hi, we are very happy to hear that! Many thanks for your support in the beta and for the nice review. Greetings Tom

content: ●20190814 •How do I use my device's clipboard? Copy and Paste? •Is it an option for you to take inspiration from Google Earth's or Google Maps' use of Gestures to navigate a map?: )●20190813 •Have you linked your YouTube app introduction video to your app's Google Play Store page? •I would prefer to be able to open audio files from the map view, without leaving map view.
replyContent: Hi, thanks for your review and opinion. I will answer your questions via your support request.

content: Love it, easy to use. But it would be even better if i could select certain nodes and enlarge them , so it'd be easier to distinguisher the layers. Now I could only enlarge all of them togather.
replyContent: Thank you for your review and opinion! Single nodes cannot be enlarged at the moment. But you can use the designer to enlarge all nodes with pictures. Maybe you can do the subdivision with colors? I will be happy to include your wish as a feature request. Let's see if other users want this feature too. Have a nice day.

content: Good apps
inconvenient to use, it could be more intuitive.
replyContent: I'm sorry about that! But please send us (to support@mindz.de) something more concrete which disturbs you exactly? We are always interested in constructive suggestions for improvement.

content: good
